Soho.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: an area in central London famous for its sex shops and gay bars, and also as a place where there are many shops and restaurants selling foreign food, especially Chinese and Italian food
Soho.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: an area of Manhattan, New York City, south of Houston Street, where there are many art galleries (gallery), restaurants, and small fashionable shops
Soho.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: a room in someoneâ€™s house with electronic equipment such as a computer and a fax machine, that is used as a place in which to work
Soho.translation[3].definitions[0].defin: abbreviation for SMALL OFFICE/ HOME OFFICE
